trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Carrollton
There were no other sightings in Carrollton on or around April 30th 1984
divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). It was after a hail storm and we were looking out of the front window ofour home. It moved differently than an airplane flying or a kite. There werewhite and green lights on the one side that we could see that flashed from oneside of the craft to the other in a steady cannon pattern. We ran outside tosee it, and the it zoomed away- we were young atthe time- our mother saidthat we imagined it
Summary: Large flying hovering triangular craft w/ lights o
